amuse.data.io.attributes
Interface AttributeInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Attribute, NominalAttribute, NumericAttribute, StringAttribute
public interface AttributeInterface

This Interface describes basic funktionality offered by Attributes.

Version:
$Id: $
Author:
Clemens Waeltken

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Returns this Attributes Name.

Returns:
Name of this Attribute.

java.lang.String getHeaderStr()
Returns the header String as used in ARFF.

Returns:
Header for this Attribute as used in ARFF,

Returns the type String as used in ARFF.

getValueCount

int getValueCount()
Use this method to get the count of values stored in this Attribute.

Returns:
Count of values in this Attribute.

getValueAt

java.lang.Object getValueAt(int index)
Return a value of this Attribute. This method is usually overwritten by Subclasses of Attribute.

Parameters:
index - The index of this value. IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown if not in range!
Returns:
Returns a value of this Attribute. The exact type of a value is determined by each implementing Class.

setValueAt

                java.lang.Object value)

addValue

void addValue(java.lang.Object value)

isValid

boolean isValid(java.lang.String value)
Check if this String would be a valid value for this Attribute. This method is only used while validating arff files loaded by DataSet.

Parameters:
value - The value to check.
Returns:
true if the given value is valid in the context of this Attribute.
